TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicket extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public NotInheritable Class PrintTicket Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 定义打印作业的设置。

span.span: Defines the settings of a print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是特定类型的 XML 文档 (称为*PrintTicket 文档*) 的易于工作的表示形式。 A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintTicket document*. 后者是一组指令, 指示打印机如何设置其各种功能 (如双面打印、排序和装订)。The latter is a set of instructions telling a printer how to set its various features (such as duplexing, collating, and stapling). 例如, 若要指示打印机在左上角打开其装订和装订打印作业, 则该文档将具有``指定**StapleTopLeft**的元素。For example, to instruct the printer to turn on its stapler and staple print jobs in the upper left corner, the document would have a `` element that specifies **StapleTopLeft**. 元素依次由 对象的属性表示。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. PrintTicket 文档必须符合[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintTicket document must conform to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 类可让你的应用程序配置打印机的功能, 而无需参与任意直接写入 XML 对象。 The class enables your application to configure the printer's features without having to engage in any direct writing of XML objects. Home 和 business 文件和照片打印机的所有最常用功能都由类的属性表示。All of the most popular features of home and business file and photo printers are represented by properties of the class. 但[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义了许多其他不太常用的功能, 并且可以对其进行扩展以处理专业打印设备的功能。But the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此, 虽然和类不能被继承, 但你可以扩展[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)来识别在或类中不考虑的打印设备功能。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[操作说明：扩展打印架构并创建新的打印系统类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100))。For more information see [How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100)). **注意**当使用采用 PrintTicket 文档 ( 作为) 参数的构造函数创建对象时,整个文档存储在对象中的非公共字段中,其中包括不太常见的对象中的XML元素不由类的任何公共属性表示的功能。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintTicket document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上, 如果生成了 PrintTicket 文档的驱动程序使用[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的专用扩展, 则该私下定义的标记也将作为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分进行存储。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题, 例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果要从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印, 请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定特定打印机的功能, 以及如何配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

[!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: 描述打印作业且符合打印架构的 XML 流。

span.span: An XML stream that describes a print job and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用符合 XML [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流（其中包含 PrintTicket 文档）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不会将流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。The constructor does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 因此, 应在调用构造函数后立即重置它。Accordingly, you should reset it immediately after calling the constructor. 整个 PrintTicket 文档存储在对象中的非公共字段中, 其中包含的 XML 元素表示不常用的功能, 这些功能不是由类的任何公共属性表示。The entire PrintTicket document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上, 如果生成了 PrintTicket 文档的驱动程序使用[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的专用扩展, 则该私下定义的标记也将作为非公共 PrintTicket 文档的一部分进行存储。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. 文档的私有部分 (如果有) 不由构造函数进行验证, 但会验证所有**打印架构**定义的部分, 包括不是由类的任何公共属性表示的部分。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 因此, 即使所有对应于公共属性的 XML 标记都有效, 也可能引发。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid. 当向写入的任何属性时, 也将更改此非公共 PrintTicket 文档。When any of the properties of the are written to, this non-public PrintTicket document is changed as well. 这是由和方法返回的非公共 PrintTicket 文档。It is this non-public PrintTicket document that is returned by the and methods.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机是否逐份打印其输出。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

value.span: 表示打印机是否逐份打印其输出的 值。

span.span: A value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate` `JobCollateAllDocuments`关键字, 而不是关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在测试打印机的功能和配置打印作业以利用它们时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

summary.span: 获取或设置打印作业的份数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，指定要打印的份数。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies how many copies to print.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments` `DocumentCopiesAllPages`关键字, 而不是关键字或`PageCopies`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机的最大值。You can test for the printer's maximum by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value less than 1.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts on the print job.

value.span: 一个 值，表示设备是否用基于设备的字体替换当前打印作业中基于计算机的字体。

span.span: A value indicating whether the device substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts for the current print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` `DocumentDuplex`关键字, 而不是关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在合并两个打印票证时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property while merging two print tickets. summary.span: 返回表示 属性值的 对象，作为符合[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the property values of a as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

returns.span: 对象，它描述带有符合打印架构的 XML 的打印票证。

span.span: A object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the Print Schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的任何属性为`null`, 则它们将不会直接包含在 XML 标记中。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果该对象是使用包含未由任何类的公共属性表示的标记元素的 printticket 文档构造的, 则这些元素将包含在由此方法返回的 PrintTicket 文档中。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document returned by this method.

span.span: Print Schema

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示要使用的送纸器（纸盒）的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示要使用的送纸器以及是手动选择还是自动选择。

span.span: An value indicating what input tray is used and whether it is chosen manually or automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 也就是说,[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`、 `DocumentInputBin`或`PageInputBin`没有标记。That is, there will be no markup for the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s features `JobInputBin`, `DocumentInputBin`, or `PageInputBin`. 如果此属性不`null`为, 则它将与[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的功能具有以下关系:When this property is not `null`, it will have the following relationships to the features defined in the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). - 如果的 XML 窗体包含`JobInputBin`, 则此属性的值与`JobInputBin`相同 (无论是否也`DocumentInputBin`有或`PageInputBin`)。If the XML form of the contains `JobInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `JobInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `DocumentInputBin` or `PageInputBin`. XML 版本的中的标记)。markup in the XML version of the ). - 如果没有`DocumentInputBin` `DocumentInputBin`标记, 但有, 则此属性的值与相同 (无论是否还`PageInputBin`存在标记)。 `JobInputBin`If there is no `JobInputBin` markup, but there is `DocumentInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `DocumentInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `PageInputBin` markup) present. - 如果既`JobInputBin`没有也`DocumentInputBin`没有`PageInputBin`标记, 但有标记, 则此属性的值与`PageInputBin`相同。If there is neither `JobInputBin` nor `DocumentInputBin` markup, but there is `PageInputBin` markup, then this property has the same value as `PageInputBin`. 如果将此属性设置为任何值, 则会`JobInputBin`将匹配的标记添加到 XML 打印票证, 并`DocumentInputBin`将`PageInputBin`删除已存在的任何和标记。When this property is set to any value, then matching `JobInputBin` markup will be added to the XML print ticket and any `DocumentInputBin` and `PageInputBin` markup that is already there will be removed. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示打印作业输出质量的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the quality of output for the print job.

value.span: 指定所需质量级别的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the needed level of quality.

summary.span: 获取或设置打印机在执行打印作业时所使用的页面分辨率等级。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of page resolution that the printer uses for a print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有属性, 您可以在其中为 X 和 Y 尺寸指定每英寸点数, 还可以指定一个属性, 可在其中为分辨率提供一个定性表达式。The class has properties in which you can specify the dots-per-inch for the X and Y dimensions and a property where you can give a qualitative expression to the resolution. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageResolution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageResolution` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PageScalingFactor As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PageScalingFactor { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };
member this.PageScalingFactor : Nullable<int> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置打印机放大或缩小页面上打印图像的百分率。

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.

value.span: 一个表示百分数的 值。

span.span: An value that represents a percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印机可能具有最大和最小缩放限制。The printer can have maximum and minimum limits for scaling. 您可以使用测试缩放限制。You can test for scale limits by using . 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性通常表示[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`关键字的**小数位数** `ScoredProperty` 。This property generally represents the **Scale** `ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有些复杂, 如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. 读取属性时, 属性的行为如下所示。When reading the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果`PageScaling` PrintTicket XML 文档的功能设置为**CustomSquare**选项, 并且**CustomSquare**选项的**Scale**值为正值, 则这是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **CustomSquare** option, and the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 如果 PrintTicket `PageScaling` XML 文档的功能设置为 "**自定义**" 选项, 并且**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth**值为正值, 则这是返回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **Custom** option, and the **Custom** option's **ScaleWidth** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 在所有其他情况下`null` , 均返回。In all other cases, `null` is returned. 设置属性时, 属性的行为如下所示。When setting the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果将其设置为`null`, `PageScaling`则会从 PrintTicket XML 文档中删除标记。If it's set to `null`, then the `PageScaling` markup is removed from the PrintTicket XML document. - 否则, 将`PageScaling` PrintTicket XML 文档中的功能设置为**CustomSquare** , 并将**CustomSquare**选项的**Scale**值设置为传递的值。Otherwise, the `PageScaling` feature in the PrintTicket XML document is set to **CustomSquare** and the **CustomSquare** option's **Scale** value is set to the passed value. (如果属性设置为小于1的值, 请参阅**异常**情况。)(See **Exceptions** for what happens if the property is set to a value less than 1.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PagesPerSheet As Nullable(Of Integer)

member this.PagesPerSheet : Nullable<int> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置打印在一张纸的每一打印面上的页数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，表示打印在一张纸的每个打印面上的页数。

span.span: A nullable value that represents the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机仅支持有限范围的特定可能性, 如1、2、4、6、8和16个页面。Most printers support only a limited range of specific possibilities, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, and 16 pages per side. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字的**PagesPerSheet** `ScoredProperty` , 而不`DocumentNUp`是关键字。This property corresponds to the **PagesPerSheet**`ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机如何排列打印在一张纸的每一页面上的多页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 用于表示打印机如何在一张纸上呈现多页的 值。

span.span: A value indicating how a printer presents multiple pages per sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 打印机可以从左到右行显示页面, 行从上到下堆积。For example, a printer can present pages in left-to-right rows with rows stacked top-to-bottom. 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字的**PresentationDirection**子功能, 而不`DocumentNUp`是关键字。This property corresponds to the **PresentationDirection** subfeature of the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为不在 枚举范围内的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示打印机在打印照片时所使用的定性的质量级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.

value.span: 用于表示照片质量级别的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the level of photo quality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 照片式打印机驱动程序将此属性中的定性表达式转换为特定的定量值, 以实现决策和其他因素。The photographic printer driver translates the qualitative expression in this property into specific quantitative values for resolution and other factors. 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

span.span: The that holds the saved .

summary.span: 通过使用符合[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 格式将 设置保存到 对象。

span.span: Saves the settings to a object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会将流的读写位置重置回其原始位置。This method does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 调用此方法后, 应立即重置。You should reset it immediately after calling this method. 如果的任何属性为`null`, 则它们将不会直接包含在 XML 标记中。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果该对象是使用包含未由任何类的公共属性表示的标记元素的 printticket 文档构造的, 则这些元素将包含在由此方法保存的 PrintTicket 文档中。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document saved by this method.

span.span: Print Schema

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示打印机是否装订多页以及装订多页位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.

value.span: 用于指定打印机如何装订输出的 值。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer staples the output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 打印机可以将两个装订在纸张的左边缘, 或在左上角放置一个书钉。For example, a printer can place two staples on the left edge of a sheet of paper, or one staple in the upper left corner. 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments` `DocumentStaple`关键字, 而不是关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在测试打印机的功能和配置打印作业以利用它们时使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为不在 枚举范围内的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TrueTypeFontMode As Nullable(Of TrueTypeFontMode)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> TrueTypeFontMode { Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示打印机如何处理使用 TrueType 字体的文本的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the printer handles text that uses TrueType fonts.

value.span: 用于指定打印机如何处理 TrueType 字体的 值。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer handles TrueType fonts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此`null`属性的值表示未指定此功能设置。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外, `null`当该值为时, 的 XML 版本 (请参见和) 将不包含此功能的任何标记。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 此属性对应于[打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword. 您可以使用属性测试打印机支持的选项。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 调用代码操作尝试将属性设置为不在 枚举范围内的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.
